website_summaries.verdict: These elegant sunglasses feature a dark tortoise shell frame and brown gradient lenses. A fantastic price for a brand-designer, these sunglasses are well-made and extremely flattering.
pros: Comes with a protective carrying case

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Great quality and good feel to them. Amazing price for the sunglasses! Cute fit and fit comfortablely. Came in a nice white leather case, and good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: PinkGurl86

customer_reviews.title: Likely Used or "Factory Mistake"
customer_reviews.text: My assumption is these are either used or the factory mishaps that Michael Kors can't sell under their name. It is of very poor quality compared to store-bought or bought from "Michael Kors" as the seller...these glasses were warped, disfigured (although easy enough to warp back into the right shape), and grease covered the lenses. What I received is not what I expect at all for this price point or buying a brand name such as Michael Kors. Disappointed, yet still functional and "repairable" - I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeli

customer_reviews.title: They are great, until you lean forward
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these glasses, but the sides lost their hold so fast that I can't wear them anymore. It's only been 9 months. I buy expensive glasses because I expect to use them for years. My last pair was Coach, and I used them for 6 years, only tossing because I had scratched the lenses, still fit perfect. These fall off every time I move my head, which is super frustrating. They fit fine in the beginning, just seem to have lost their shape really quick. And I'm clearly way too late for a return. Guess this one is just a loss.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I bought these like a year ago & they are just a new as the day I first got them. These are my everyday glasses, I have Costas, Rayban, and others and I just love the way these fit. They stay on my face & head really well also which is hard for me to find. I live in FL and always need eye sun protection. These are dark enough but not too dark. I have even worn them in the pouring down rain on the highway because the brown lenses help lighten the gray dismal rain and brighten the view. Definitely worth every penny spent
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Holman

customer_reviews.title: Basic glasses with big case
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it that much .it is very basic and medium size but doesn’t sit well on my face I don’t feel comfortable when wearing it.it came with white huge protector case but still need to figure it out how to put the big case inside my bag it takes almost half of the room of my medium sized bag also the case not very easy to open and close I don’t know that much A+ positive comments about what????!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: First impressions love how they look and feel. So far meets expectations. I left out one star due to shipping. Shipping could have been much faster than about 10 days. Overall happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Deliana

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she loves them. What else can I say , if she is happy then I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses, they fit very comfortably. Only complaint is that they get very smudged up at the tops near the bridge of the nose from my makeup, but that's a me problem. I just wipe them off with the cleaning cloth that these came with.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I think the glasses are great. Fit nice, do not look cheap st all! Great case.. Yes, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Love shoes

customer_reviews.title: really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this one paying heavy amount to surprise my wife as a gift of mothers day. The unit looked really cheap quality. the fixtures are loose and does not look really from MK. I am really disappointed, why not just buy Chinese glasses for $10 bucks than spending so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chandan Paul

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: great sunglasses. Good quality. Only issue is the temple (part that goes over your ear). Where it goes from gold to black is not smooth, so if I wore the sunglass on my headed, then tried to take it off and put on my face, it would snag my hair. very minor. Still love the glasses and wear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Trudred

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!!! I collect high end sunglasses and I have never purchased a pair online. These are totally worth it and the price is a steal. I love big frames. So if you have a small face, these may not be for you. They fit perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Chavez

customer_reviews.title: If you have a wide face, these are for you
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide head, so almost all sunglasses give me a headache. These are perfect and have bendable joints. My only complaint is they feel a bit flimsy for being Michael Kors, but I will be sure to put them in the case when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They leave a mark on your nose!
customer_reviews.text: I do like the look of these sunglasses a lot, however they do leave a red mark/indent on your nose after wearing them for a short time. I usually have to dab on some cover-up when I take them off which is pain. The price has actually increased by 20 bucks from when I bought them in 2019! So, I definitely would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cute shades
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice clean and sharp straight from packaging as far as wearing them they aren’t as cute as I was hoping I wish the sides were a little thicker. But the glasses are cute for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Carter

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are somewhat oddly tight. I’d say they run a little small, but the size for the actual lenses is big, really big. If I had tried them on beforehand I would have passed & if they hadn’t been ordered for me as a gift from my son I would have returned them
customer_reviews.author: Liz Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Must haves great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit love them now have the brown and black ones. Was a little nervous buying sunglasses before trying them on but theses are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A.

customer_reviews.title: No durable
customer_reviews.text: At first I love it until they broke on me very fast
customer_reviews.author: Analex

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal, plus the price was right, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Salais

customer_reviews.title: Loose fitting
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, shape of these glasses and they look nice on. The tint is perfect also, however, they fit very loosely. I’m afraid to bend them too much for fear of breaking them. If not for that they would be perfect!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brinks

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE These Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE These Glasses! I Recently Got Hooked On Michael Kors. They Came In A Very Nice Case. They Are So Stylish & I Always Get Compliments On Them! I Want Them In Every Color Now!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved them
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Xmas. She loved them. Michael Kors is one of her favorites. These look to be higher quality in person. Especially with the gold accent.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5

customer_reviews.title: Paying for the name not the product
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for Not worth it even for the name I was surprised they were scratched. Now I’m out glasses, money and have to ship back
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses. They are a nice size and weight. Not too heavy on the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie8947

customer_reviews.title: Bit bigger than picture shows
customer_reviews.text: They are a little bigger than I thought they were by looking at the picture but they will work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Winchel

customer_reviews.title: good porotection!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and lovely I give it 5 stars as it exceeded my expectations due to low price
customer_reviews.author: Book Eater

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution
customer_reviews.text: The glasses I received are not what I expected at all. They came in a cheap looking and feeling MK glasses case. I've gotten better from Ross. The glasses themselves are okay, but they're not what I ordered! Which causes me to believe that I got ripped off with some knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Quality, unreliable delivery  service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift, I'm not very satisfied with the quality, unreliable shipping service
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! They fit perfect and are very stylish! Definitely my favorite pair!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Carry

customer_reviews.title: Fly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these glasses. Comfortable and fashionable and they came the very next day.

customer_reviews.title: ATTRACTIVE AND GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are very attractive and fit my face perfectly. Have gotten compliments on the style.
customer_reviews.author: JMMc

customer_reviews.title: She loved the
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daughter-in-law. She loved the glasses
customer_reviews.author: Diane Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these sunglasses . Great quality , stylish and came in an awesome case as well.
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sunglasses. They fit well and are a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great shades!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these. The fit and style are great, the tint gives you a blueish shade in the sunlight, and they come with a white case and lens cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McIntee

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses were way to wide for my face which made them uncomfortable. I have a skinner face so I had to return. They were cute though, and good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These were a great purchase for wife. Look great and fit well. Would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The frames look great. I’m not sure if the are authentic Michael Kors’ frames but they look and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: MaternalUnit

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses has a comfortable fit. Compared to my other sunglasses, Michael Kors brand is heavy duty. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mililani1994

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE GLASSSES
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE GLASSSES, FIT PERFECT, VERY WILL MADE, SHIPPED WELL, FAST SHIPPING NO COMPLAINTS aaaaPLUS SELLER WILL BUY FROMT HEM AGAIN AND AGAIN...
customer_reviews.author: ndbrooks

customer_reviews.title: Sunshine Go Away
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pair of sunglasses I owned. So good at keeping the sun out of my eyes whether I;m driving or sitting on the passenger side of the car. I enjoy wearing and keep them in the car at all times. Perfect for a sunny day. The case and the cloth is also great. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Carter

customer_reviews.title: Just love the style
customer_reviews.text: Very happy the way they fit and look it’s my second pair. Because I like these frames so much I only buy them for the style of the frame I then have the lenses replaced with my prescription ones.

customer_reviews.title: Just for looks
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece and she loved them. Great quality for the price

customer_reviews.title: Saved me a trip to the store

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it , good quality & great price & fast delivery

customer_reviews.title: Must have glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses! I bought them in black and brown!

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly. I have high cheek bones and these fit my face comfortably.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sunglasses! The quality is great and comes with a case and cleaning cloth. I always said I wouldn’t order an expensive pair of sunglasses in case I lose or scratch them. I’m so happy with my purchase. I get compliments every time I wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Massoglia

customer_reviews.title: Size too big!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape and the style, but they keep coming loose!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a really hard time finding sunglasses that fit. I was super skeptical that I'd like these without trying them on. I love them! They fit perfectly and I really like the way the look on. Would definitely buy these again!

customer_reviews.title: Real
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister's bday. She loves them. They seem like real Michael Kors. Hope so.

customer_reviews.text: At less than $100, these are a good price when compared to other sunglasses.

customer_reviews.title: Half price
customer_reviews.text: I liked that they were half the price of the same ones my boyfriend bought in Hollywood. I dropped them in the lake....I love amazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Look just like the picture displayed. We're a gift and the person loved them.

customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses! The fit was exact and looks really good.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Good for every outfit. Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and light as a feather. Elegant. Timeless. Good for every outfit. This is my second purchase of this same item. Thumbs up!

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked them, because of the brand and they looked like just as shown.

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses!!! I’ve been wanting them for a while now and I always clicked on the picture wanting it but I hesitated to order. Thank god I did! Not too big, perfect size and light weight. Worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Not for rounded faced people but still pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have a fat face so it doesn't look that appealing on me but If you have a slim face I encourage you to buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife. She loves it. You totally get what you paid for.

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Women's 0MK2024
product_meta.description: These Michael Kors™ sunglasses will add some mystique and flair to your look! Plastic frames and temples. Hardware logo embellishment at temples. Gradient lenses provide UV protection. Protective case. Imported. WARNING California's Proposition 65 Measurements: Eye Size: 54 mm Bridge: 13 mm Temple Size: 124 mm Weight: 1.2 oz
